trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_SEQ_00<tab>Regitt needs a pilot to demonstrate the Rolling Tankard's firepower.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_TODO_01<tab>Pilot the Rolling Tankard to Clearmelt and fire its cannon at the target automaton.
TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_TODO_02<tab>Pilot the Rolling Tankard to Clearmelt and fire its cannon at the target automaton a second time.

TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_REGITT_000_000<tab>A few well-placed words from Lorathia, and we've got ourselves a gaggle of prospective buyers. They're over at Clearmelt right now, waiting on a demonstration of the Rolling Tankard's firepower!

TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_REGITT_000_001<tab>One of us could pilot the tank, of course... But, you know, I'd feel far more confident if a seasoned warrior such as yourself was guiding the cannon. Wouldn't be anywhere near as impressive if we <var 1A 02 /var>missed<var 1A 01 /var> the bloody target, eh?
TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_REGITT_000_002<tab>Off you go, then! Wamutt will give you the pre-demonstration briefing.
TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_WAMUTT_000_010<tab>Where've you been!? We need to get this show on the road!
TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_WAMUTT_000_011<tab>Briefing shmiefing! Just get in the tank, drive it over to Clearmelt, and blast the target into next week! Easy!
TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_WAMUTT_000_020<tab>What are you waiting for? Head over to Clearmelt, and blow those merchants away! Uh, with the demonstration─not the cannon.

TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>An automaton stands immobile, awaiting its fate with what seems almost an air of resignation... Speak to Wamutt at Watts's Anvil to pilot a Rolling Tankard, then command its main cannon to fire upon the automaton target.
TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_AUDIENCE03923_000_030<tab>(-Entranced Entrepreneur-)Oh, my! That cannon has quite a kick! Let's see you fire it one more time, if you please!

TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_AUDIENCE03923_000_040<tab>(-Entranced Entrepreneur-)Splendid! Just splendid! Enough power to discourage even the most monstrous eater, I'd wager. Mark me down as very interested, master dwarf.

TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_DWARF03923_000_041<tab>(-Dwarven Promoter-)Nice shootin', <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You can head back to the Anvil, if you like─I think Regitt'll be happy to hear how it all went!

TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_REGITT_000_050<tab>Now there's the grin of a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who just left a smoking hole in the ground. I take it this means the demonstration went as planned?

TEXT_BANDWA122_03923_REGITT_000_051<tab>Aye, we could describe it all we want, but Lorathia was right─there's naught better than showing off the destruction firsthand. I reckon we'll need to make this a regular event!
